product_name: Sea to Summit Spark Sp II Sleeping Bag
long_description: A bit warmer than the Spark Sp I, the ultralight Sea to Summit Spark Sp II Sleeping Bag balances size, weight and warmth for 3-season backpacking, cycle touring and mountaineering. High-loft, premium 850-fill-power European goose down offers superb warmth with minimal weight; Ultra-Dry Down(TM) water-repellent treatment protects down from moisture. Ultra-Dry Down is a water-repellent polymer treatment applied to the down; Ultra-Dry Down retains 60% more loft and absorbs 30% less moisture than untreated down. With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 35degF, the Sea to Summit Spark Sp II will keep you warm on 3-season backpacking adventures. Ultralight 10-denier Pertex(R) Quantum(R) fabric with a durable water repellent treatment sheds moisture. Soft 15-denier nylon fabric lines the Sea to Summit Spark Sp II Sleeping Bag for excellent comfort next to skin. 1/3-length zipper saves weight over a full-length zipper. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
short_description: A bit warmer than the Spark Sp I, the ultralight Sea to Summit Spark Sp II Sleeping Bag balances size, weight and warmth for 3-season backpacking, cycle touring and mountaineering.
